settings.second_section_heading:
Bare Anatomy
is an analogue of beauty inside out with personalization at its core
settings.second_section_content1:
PERSONALIZED
Because
one size doesn‚Äôt fit all

Formulations customized for your unique needs and goals via our proprietary algorithm and freshly made by our team of expert scientists
settings.second_section_content3:
WHOLESOME
Because
beauty means inside out

Solutions which go beyond surface level application to work on the root cause for wellness from within, with external beauty as it‚Äôs subset
settings.third_section_cntnt: Beauty for us, isn‚Äôt only about how you look but also how you feel from within. We aim to solve for your unique concerns by putting data-driven tech and advanced scientific research right at your fingertips
settings.fifth_section_cntnt1:
Without addition, something transparent and pure.

Natural, Pure in Form, Uncovered, Transparent, and Honest
settings.fifth_section_cntnt2:
A study of the structure or internal workings of something.

Scientific, Fundamental, Depth of Knowledge, and Natural Findings
settings.fifth_section_cntnt3:
Inspired by one of Leonardo da Vinci‚Äôs finest work,‚ÄòThe Vitruvian Man‚Äô

Symbolizes the three essential core beliefs of Bare Anatomy -
Science, Artistry, and Humanitarianism
settings.six_section_heading: Discover how science meets transparency for us
settings.six_section_cntnt1:
Our unique formulations are made with ethically sourced botanical extracts

All our products are -

Dermatologically tested safe for use

Free of harsh chemicals like sulfates, parabens etc.

PETA certified

Handpicked by our proprietary algorithm

In adherence to EU norms for clean beauty
settings.six_section_cntnt2: Our thoroughly researched proprietary algorithm analyzes your uniBetter for People + Planetque profile, goals & lifestyle to match that with clean, effective ingredients backed by advanced science for visible results.
settings.six_section_cntnt3: Our packaging material is 100% recyclable and uses no plastic for shipping. Our personalized products are freshly made & completely clean - allowing for clean disposal and no wasteful excess inventories.
settings.seventh_section_cntnt1: Backed by years of rigorous research to bring you formulations infused with nature and perfected by science
settings.seventh_section_cntnt2: A game changing approach to beauty inside out, driven by deep data tech to build solutions for your unique concerns
settings.seventh_section_cntnt3: Eco-friendly and sustainability focussed, from building your custom formulation to doorstep delivery.
settings.team_maintitle:
Meet the Brains
behind Bare Anatomy
settings.team_content_1:
A serial entrepreneur,
Rohit puts the ‚Äòchief‚Äô in Chief Executive Officer. Armed with a solid skill set of brand development & strategy, you will usually find him scurrying in & out of meetings and giving shape to all our ideas.
settings.team_content_2:
The creative half of our team,
nobody understands design as well as Sifat. An alumnus of NIFT Bangalore, she heads the Marketing & Branding team. An ardent dog mum, her love for disruptive ideas is only second to her love for dancing
settings.team_content_3:
Our chief product geek,
Vimal comes with extensive experience in R&D with cosmetic giants such as Johnson & Johnson and Unilever. You can almost always find him obsessing over the latest cosmetic tech in the market!

settings.amb_first_sec:
Hi friend,
Time to upgrade your beauty routine!

settings.ref_faqcon:
Q. Where can I access my referral code?

A. As soon as you place your first order, you are automatically signed up for our referral program. We will send you an email with your unique code which you can use to refer friends and family. You can also sign into your account and go to the ‚ÄòReferrals‚Äô tab from the navigation menu to access your referral code and other details.


Q. Can I refer someone who's an existing user?

A. No, the referral program can only be used to refer new users.


Q. I've purchased from Innovist previously. Can I participate in the referral program?

A. Yes, the referral program is open to all existing users and new users who sign up and place their first order with us. Simply log into account at www.innovist.com and head over to the 'Referrals' section from the navigation menu to access your referral details.

Q. What benefit do I get for referring my friend?

A. You will get flat Rs. 350 Balance in your wallet when your friend makes their first purchase with us. You can use this amount on your future purchases with us.


Q. What benefit does my friend get?

A. Your friend gets a flat INR 350 off on his first purchase when he uses your referral code/link.


Q. Is my account credited every time my referral makes a purchase?

A. No, your account is credited only when your referral makes his first purchase. Balance is not applicable on subsequent purchases by your referral.


Q. Does my referral get a discount on every purchase he makes with my referral code?

A. Your referral can avail INR 350 off only on his first purchase with your referral code. This discount is not valid on subsequent purchases made by your referral.


Q. When is my Balance amount credited?

A. Your Balance amount of INR 350 is credited as soon as a new referral places their first order with us.

Q. Where can I use my wallet balance?

A. Balance is valid on all categories available with us - haircare, skincare,sunscreen. There is no minimum purchase value that you need to meet to be able to use your Balance


Q. What is the limit of balance that I can use on a single order?

A. There is no limit to the balance you can use on any given order. The whole amount can be used on a single purchase if it is equivalent to or lesser than the cart value.


Q. When does my BareCash expire?

A. balance expires 90 days after it has been awarded. We send you a reminder email before the expiry date to use your balance.


Q. Does balance cover Cash on Delivery charges and shipping charges?

A. No, balance does not cover Cash on Delivery charges or shipping charges. It can only discount the cart value.


Q. Can I use my BareCash amount with any existing sale or promotions?

A. Yes, you can redeem your credits and also avail any existing promotion to discount the cart value.


Q. What is the value of 1 balance credit?

A. 1 balance credit gives you a discount equivalent to INR 1. So 0balance credits will give you a discount of INR 350 off on the cart value.


Q. What happens if a part of my balance expires before another part, in case they were earned on different days?

A. All balance will automatically expire 90 days after the date of the last balance credit, including balance learned before the most recent purchase.

Q. Is there any other way to earn balance in my wallet?

A. Yes, every time you place an order with us, we credit 20% of the purchase value as credits to your wallet.


Q. What all modes of payment are available for my order?

A. You can pay via COD, credit cards, debit cards and UPI payment options.

settings.hair_care_review_title: Amazing Results! Got my desired hair quality!
settings.hair_care_review_content: Thanks to Bare Anatomy for giving me back my desired hair quality ‚ù§Ô∏è Stress and styling along with the pollution had made my hair frizzy and dry but after switching to Bare Anatomy, I have seen amazing results!

From now on I‚Äôm rooting for a customized formula for my hair & scalp!  The haircare range from Bare Anatomy is by far the best & most effective that I've tried! My hair is softer, smoother and smells wonderful without drying out my scalp. Well done guys!

settings.hair_care_review_title: Worked wonders to combat my hairfall
settings.hair_care_review_content: I love their conditioner & the hair oil! It has worked wonders for my hairfall. I used their complete regime of pre-shampoo mask, shampoo & conditioner & there's no going back to standard products ever

settings.hair_care_review_title: I'm obsessed! Pre Shampoo Mask is a must try!
settings.hair_care_review_content: Bare Anatomy's customised hair care range is my one stop solution. In just about a month of using their 3 step hair regime, my hair is softer and has a good shine. I'm obsessed with their pre-shampoo mask for the nourishment it provides. Must try!

settings.hair_care_review_title: Effective clean beauty with visible results
settings.hair_care_review_content: My hair  has always been difficult to manage and I am glad to find a brand that offers personalized hair care to tackle this! Their products are plant derieved, free of harmful chemicals and freshly made every time I place my order - effective clean beauty that actually delivers visible results!

settings.hair_care_review_heading: From our Custom(ers) For your Custom(ears)

settings.logo_content: Natural, vegan and cruelty-free products which are freshly prepared on consumers‚Äô demand
Personalized as per the customer's unique needs and manufactured only after receiving the order

Freshly blended botanical formula tweaked
to work specifically for you
Their custom shampoo can take on combination issues which may be too niche for targeted products to take on

Clean and effective ingredients, backed by science, not just trends.

settings.hair_seven_first_cont:
• Fast absorbing, silicone free formulation
  • Removes dirt and oil build up from the scalp
  • Botanical extracts to nourish hair follicles
  • Deeply nourishes and hydrates hair and scalp
settings.hair_seven_sec_cont:
• 100% Sulphate-free, deep cleansing formula
  • Gently cleanses dirt, sebum, and pollution build up
  • Doesn‚Äôt dry out the scalp and hair
  • Maintains optimal pH level of the scalp
settings.hair_seven_third_cont:
• Water soluble silicones based deep conditioning formula
  • Doesn‚Äôt leave behind product residue on scalp
  • Nourishing plant oils to seal in moisture
  • Blend of advanced actives for damage repair
